description.raw:
Currently the only reliable way to build documentation with the help text included is to use the Makefile. As far as I can tell this is a slightly deprecated method of building docs and using 'sphinx-build' should be preferred (which make ultimately calls).

This change modifies the the conf.py used by sphinx-build to ensure that the necessary commands have their command help text generated in a way that's compatible with the old Makefile and current documentation.
